News.Title: Munjal Auto Industries Reports Mixed Q2 Performance with Revenue Growth and Tax Regime Transition
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries Limited announced unaudited financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025, showing revenue from operations of Rs. 38,408.54 lakhs for Q2 and profit after tax of Rs. 637.29 lakhs. The company transitioned to a new tax regime under Section 115BAA with a 25.17% tax rate and recognized a non-cash tax charge of Rs. 409.36 lakhs related to the previous year.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Industries Reports Q1 Results, Announces CFO Transition
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries Limited announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company reported standalone revenue from operations of Rs. 20,675.76 lakhs and consolidated revenue of Rs. 49,101.52 lakhs. Standalone profit after tax was Rs. 837.19 lakhs, while consolidated profit after tax reached Rs. 1,931.49 lakhs. The Board approved the resignation of CFO Brham Prakash Yadav and appointed Nitin Bachchavat as the new CFO, both changes effective October 15, 2025. Bachchavat is a Chartered Accountant with over 21 years of experience across various industries including agricultural inputs, chemicals, and telecom. The company operates in two segments: manufacturing of auto components and manufacturing of composite products & moulds.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Industries Sets Record Date for Final Dividend and 40th AGM
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries Limited has set August 14, 2025 as the record date for determining shareholder eligibility for the final dividend. The company will hold its 40th Annual General Meeting on August 25, 2025, where the final dividend will be considered for approval. Book closure dates are scheduled from August 15 to August 25, 2025. If approved at the AGM, the final dividend will be paid within 30 days of declaration after deduction of applicable tax. The company trades on BSE under scrip code 520059 and on NSE under symbol MUNJALAU.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Industries Reports Q4 Results and Dividend Recommendation
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries has reported its Q4 financial results and recommended a dividend. The company's Q4 EBITDA decreased to 93 million rupees from 116 million rupees year-over-year, with EBITDA margin falling to 2.97% from 4.17%. Q4 net profit declined to 40 million rupees from 77.2 million rupees year-over-year, while revenue increased to 3.1 billion rupees from 2.78 billion rupees. The company has recommended a dividend of 1 rupee per equity share.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Reports Reduced Q3 Net Loss and Increased Revenue
News.Summary: Munjal Auto has released its Q3 financial results, showing a significant reduction in net loss and an increase in revenue compared to the same period last year. The company reported a consolidated net loss of 22 million rupees, down from 122.4 million rupees in the previous year. Revenue for Q3 grew to 5.2 billion rupees from 4.2 billion rupees year-over-year, indicating improved sales performance.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Reports Decline in Q3 EBITDA and Margin
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries Limited has reported a decrease in its third-quarter financial performance. The company's EBITDA (Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization) fell to 223 million rupees from 261 million rupees in the same quarter of the previous year. Additionally, the EBITDA margin declined to 4.27% from 6.17% year-over-year.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Reports Reduced Q3 Net Loss and Increased Revenue
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries Limited has reported financial results for the third quarter. The company's consolidated net loss narrowed to 22 million rupees, compared to a loss of 122.4 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue for Q3 increased to 5.2 billion rupees from 4.2 billion rupees year-over-year, showing a significant improvement in top-line performance.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Industries Reports Q2 EBITDA Decline
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries has reported a decrease in its Q2 EBITDA, which fell to 112 million rupees from 154 million rupees year-over-year. The company's EBITDA margin also declined to 3.39% from 3.86% in the same period last year.

News.Title: Munjal Auto Industries Reports Q2 Financial Results
News.Summary: Munjal Auto Industries has announced its Q2 financial results. The company's net profit increased to 151 million rupees, up from 115 million rupees year-over-year and 143 million rupees quarter-over-quarter. However, revenue decreased to 3.3 billion rupees from 3.97 billion rupees compared to the same quarter last year.
